title: 5.4 Master Challenge 1
question: Tina has to move 30 GB of data from her local drive to free up some space in her system. The data primarily includes photos and videos. Suggest suitable options to help Tina move the data.
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - javascript - R - pseudocode - java
